ComicInfo.Title: The Crucible Chapter Four: Harvey Horrors
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hell hath no fury! It's Sabrina in the underworld as she and her companions risk everything - including their immortal souls - to rescue Harvey's consciousness, trapped in the Dark Pit. Meanwhile, with Greendale's most powerful witch missing in action, Madame Satan launches an attack on the Spellman household, but Hilda and Zelda are not helpless, and then of course there's Cousin Ambrose to contend with!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Robert Hack | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Robert Hack | 2 | *Notes:* The Variant cover is a homage of the movie poster for Carrie.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:26:15. [CVDB496445]
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Aunt Hilda Spellman, Aunt Zelda Spellman, Betty Cooper, Big Ethel, Chuck Clayton, Cousin Ambrose, Dilton Doiley, Harvey Kinkle, Head Witch Della, Jughead Jones, Madam Satan, Moose Mason, Mr. Weatherbee, Reggie Mantle, Rosalind, Sabrina Spellman, Salem, Veronica Lodge
